title: Andy Flower domain review of player profiles
description: Cricket domain validation: Verify all tag color-coding makes sense (green=strength, red=vulnerability, blue=neutral). Check that phase performance thresholds are correct. Validate vs bowling type categories (Pace/Spin/Off-spin/Leg-spin/Left-arm). Confirm entry point classifications. Review sample profiles for 5 players across roles (1 opener, 1 middle-order, 1 finisher, 1 bowler, 1 all-rounder). Sign off that profiles are cricket-accurate.

florentino_gate.reason: Core product functionality surfacing existing data. Founder-mandated.
